meanings.definition: Exceeding the standard or desired length.
meanings.sent1: The overlength scarf kept her warm on the chilly day.
meanings.sent2: The overlength movie made it hard to stay focused.
meanings.sent3: His overlength shoelaces kept getting tangled in knots.
meanings.sent4: The overlength line at the store seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The overlength hair of the princess flowed down her back like a golden waterfall.

meanings.definition: To extend beyond the usual or specified length.
meanings.sent1: The vines overlengthed the fence and reached the other side.
meanings.sent2: The speech overlengthed the time limit by a few minutes.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to overlength its body to fit through the tiny gap.
meanings.sent4: The river overlengthed its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches overlengthed towards the sky, reaching for the sun.
